[sniffles] This is my first ever Guinness.
Yay. Cheers, everyone.
I can't believe what that tastes like.
Have you had one of these?
Yeah, I expected it to be a lot sweeter, like butterscotch.
translation.ko: 버터 스카치 사탕처럼 훨씬 달콤할 줄 알았어

translation.en: [man on TV] Our coverage of the royal wedding continues
translation.ko: 왕실 결혼식 소식을 이어서 전해 드립니다

translation.en: with Peter Ring covering today's wonderful festivities.
translation.ko: 피터 링 기자가 축제의 열기를 전합니다

translation.en: Peter Ring here, covering today's festivities.
translation.ko: 오늘 축전을 전해 드리는 피터 링입니다

translation.en: Droves of people have been coming down in droves
to celebrate what is sure to be the most wonderful day so far
that the world has managed to have.
The royal wedding is happening right now.
We can't see it from out here, but one thing's for sure.
translation.ko: 여기서는 보이지 않지만 지금 결혼식이 진행 중입니다

translation.en: It's happening. The couple are both 31, and it's all completely brilliant.
The atmosphere out here is about as wonderful as it gets.
I've been talking to this upbeat family about just how wonderful it all is.
translation.ko: 여기 있는 활기찬 가족의 소감을 들어 봤는데요

translation.en: Bav Davison, just how wonderful is it?
translation.ko: 바브 데이비슨 씨 지금 기분이 어떠십니까?

translation.en: Well, I've got to say, I was just saying this as well to my family and nieces.
It's been a wonderful day. The atmosphere is absolutely brilliant.
Best day of my life. Best marriage.
What a day. And what a fantastic day, as well.
[laughs] Well, that's wonderful to hear. And well said.
translation.ko: 좋은 말씀을 해 주셨네요 잘 말씀하셨어요

translation.en: This is it. There's no other way to say it. We're having such a top time.
translation.ko: 다른 말로는 표현할 수 없어요 최고의 순간이에요

translation.en: And what is it you think will be particularly special about this marriage?
translation.ko: 이 결혼식의 특별한 점은 뭐라고 생각하세요?

translation.en: Oh… They've just got everything. They're such an exceptional couple.
translation.ko: 모든 걸 가진 부부잖아요 독보적인 한 쌍이죠

translation.en: And I can't wait to get a closer look at them
and then to say some very positive stuff about them.
Yeah? What stuff will you say?
Erm, I might say, oh, you know, their eyes lit up the sky, something like that.
translation.ko: 두 사람 눈빛이 하늘을 수놓는다는 말이요

translation.en: Ha! I think we're all looking forward to hearing her say that. [chuckles]
translation.ko: 그 말씀이 나오기를 다들 고대할 것 같네요

translation.en: Er, I said earlier that people were coming down in their droves.
translation.ko: 제가 아까 사람들이 우르르 모였다고 했는데요

translation.en: -Have they, really? -Yes.
Yeah. I think it's understandable. Because for me, it's such an amazing day
that I would come down in my droves if it meant being a part of the day.
translation.ko: 여기 참여할 수 있다면 저라도 우르르 올 거예요

translation.en: That's amazing. Enjoy your day. Let's have a lick of ice cream and I'll be on my way.

translation.ko: 고작 결혼식 때문에 이렇게 모인 거예요?

translation.en: -What's everyone celebrating? -Shut up.
Shut up! Don't ask horrid questions, you awful girl! Off!
translation.ko: 닥쳐라, 감히 그딴 질문을 하다니! 발칙한 것, 꺼져라!

translation.en: and the atmosphere here is wonderful.
-Amazing, isn't it? -Yeah, it is amazing.

It didn't bring all the country together. It didn't feel pleasant or brilliant.
translation.ko: 온 나라가 축하해 주지도 않았고 기쁘지도 화려하지도 않았죠

translation.en: No one came in their droves. It was nothing.

Nothing whatsoever. And that kind of sums up the feeling here today.
A feeling of elation. A feeling of reverence and a sense of community.
And a sense that until today, literally nothing of worth has happened.

-[all cheering] -We love it!
Look at this guy!
This is history!
